projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: {count, plural, =0 {No projects} =1 {1 project in progress} other {# projects in progress}}
projects.noProjectsDesc: Create your first life project and start architecting your future.
projects.daysRemaining: {count, plural, =1 {1 day remaining} other {# days remaining}}
projects.monthsRemaining: {count, plural, =1 {1 month remaining} other {# months remaining}}
projects.yearsRemaining: {count, plural, =1 {1 year remaining} other {# years remaining}}

planner.title: Daily Planner
planner.generatingDesc: Analyzing your projects, trackers and preferences
planner.readyToGenerateDesc: Generate a smart plan adapted to your projects and energy level.
planner.removeTask: Remove this task from the schedule

trackers.title: My Trackers
trackers.subtitle: {count, plural, =0 {No trackers} =1 {1 active tracker} other {# active trackers}}
trackers.noTrackersDesc: Create your first tracker to monitor your habits and recurring goals.

agenda.title: Next Steps
agenda.subtitle: Current step and next one for each project
agenda.noStepsDesc: All your steps are completed or you don't have any projects yet.

auth.hasAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.signUpSuccess: Sign up successful! Check your email to confirm your account.
auth.emailAlreadyUsed: This email is already in use. Please sign in.
auth.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email before signing in
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information and work preferences
profile.wakeUpTimeDesc: No tasks will be scheduled before this time
profile.sleepTimeDesc: No tasks will be scheduled after this time
profile.morningRoutineHelp: Describe the activities you do every morning. AI will better organize your schedule.
profile.nightRoutinePlaceholder: E.g.: Dinner, tidying, reading, skincare, preparing for tomorrow...
profile.nightRoutineHelp: Describe the activities you do every evening before sleep.
profile.workScheduleDesc: Indicate your work hours. No tasks will be scheduled during this time.
profile.blockedTimeSlotsDesc: Define recurring time slots where you don't want tasks scheduled (classes, regular appointments, family time, etc.)
profile.slotAddedDesc: The blocked time slot has been added successfully.
profile.slotDeletedDesc: The blocked time slot has been deleted successfully.
profile.slotErrorDesc: Please provide a title and at least one day
profile.enableNotificationsDesc: Receive reminders for your tasks and goals
profile.privacyDesc: View your GDPR rights, export your data or permanently delete your account and all your information.
profile.profileSavedDesc: Your changes have been saved successfully.
